DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate correct QT interval change ( automatic-reading ) single oral administration escitalopram , quetiapine moxifloxacin versus placebo healthy Korean Adults .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Effect Corrected QT Interval Prolongation Psychotropic Drugs
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy subject age 20 40 year . 2 . A body weight range 50 kg ( inclusive ) 90 kg ( inclusive ) body mass index ( BMI ) range 19.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) 25.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . 3 . Sufficient ability understand nature study hazard participate . Provide write informed consent fully . inform study procedure . 1 . Presence history hypersensitivity allergic reaction drug include investigational product ( Escitalopram , Quetiapine , Moxifloxacin ) ) quinolone group antibiotic . 2 . Subject judge eligible study participation investigator .
